EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
GABON.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 01-13.22S 008-55.12E
   AT 241045Z OCT. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO
   KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE
   EXTREME CAUTION. REPORT TO MDAT-GOG,
   PHONE:  332 9822 8888
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG,
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 311356Z OCT 19.
